rect.style: stroke-width: 2px; fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke-width: 2px; fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round;
stroke-width: 2px; fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round;

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(217, 217, 214); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; transform-origin: -232.5px -75px; fill: rgb(217, 217, 214);
stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(217, 217, 214); transform-origin: -232.5px -159px;
